_sText:
My first map. It's a short speedrun map which takes about 1:10min to 1:30 to complete. Thanks to karasu for the sound script, helping with several issues I had. I wanted to add env_steam but it just caused a lot of lag
Any constructive criticism is appreciated, thanks.

Textures/models:
Silkroad - FirewaveZz
Realworldtextures - TopHattWaffles
NeoTokyo textures+models

I don't own the music.

re-uploaded - the download was broken

Thanks to karasu for making this playable
EDIT [10/15/15]: 
- Fixed missing models+textures (trees and everything should be good)
- added a bit of clutter at last level
- Lowered soundtrack volume
- Improved lighting
- Improved bhop platform contrast for visibility
